    drawTile() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.decks.TileDeck
    This method is the only action that you can perform on this deck, when you draw a pace down tile, you can either: - Use it on your ship - Putting it back on the table face up (FlippedTileDeck) Either way you eliminate that tile from the deck.
    drawTile(int, boolean, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.GameModel
